          <title>
            <string language="fr">Prévisions</string>
            <string language="en">Predictions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorhersagen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Predições</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Previsioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προβλέψεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Predicciones</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Plats mobiles : Prévisions. Exercice  interactif, avec des réponses, regardant pourquoi il est difficile  que les scientifiques prévoient exactement des tremblements de terre ou des éruptions volcaniques.</string>
            <string language="en">Moving plates: Predictions. Interactive exercise, with answers, looking at why it is difficult for scientists to accurately predict earthquakes or volcanic eruptions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lithosphère et processus tectoniques</string>
            <string language="en">lithosphere & tectonic processes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">roches et sols</string>
            <string language="en">rocks and soils</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">formation de roche</string>
            <string language="en">rock formation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plaques tectoniques</string>
            <string language="en">tectonic plates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">tremblements de terre</string>
            <string language="en">earthquakes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">éruptions  volcaniques</string>
            <string language="en">volcanic eruptions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">volcans</string>
            <string language="en">volcanoes</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="fr">manteau</string>
            <string language="en">mantle</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegliche Platten: Vorhersagen. _ 
interaktiv Übung, mit Antwort, betrachten warum es sein schwierig 
für Wissenschaftler zu genau voraussagen Erdbeben oder volcanic 
Eruption.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Placas moventes: Predições. 
Exercício interativo, com as respostas, olhando porque é 
difícil para cientistas predizer exatamente terremotos ou eruptions 
vulcânicos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Piastre commoventi: Previsioni. 
Esercitazione interattiva, con le risposte, guardanti perchè è
difficile affinchè gli scienziati predica esattamente i terremoti o i
eruptions vulcanici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κινούμενα πιάτα: Προβλέψεις. Διαλογική 
άσκηση, με τις απαντήσεις, που εξετάζουν γιατί είναι δύσκολο για
τους επιστήμονες να προβλέψουν ακριβώς τους σεισμούς ή τις 
ηφαιστειακές εκρήξεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Placas móviles: Predicciones. 
Ejercicio interactivo, con las respuestas, mirando porqué es 
difícil que los científicos predigan exactamente terremotos o 
erupciones volcánicas.</string>
          </description>
